member.name: T:Stimulsoft.Report.Mobile.JSON
member.summary:
This class encodes and decodes JSON strings. http://www.json.org/
JSON uses Arrays and Objects. These correspond here to the datatypes ArrayList and Hashtable. All numbers are parsed to doubles.

member.name: M:Stimulsoft.Report.Mobile.JSON.Decode(System.String)
member.summary: Parses the string json into a value
member.param: A JSON string.
member.returns: An ArrayList, a Hashtable, a double, a string, null, true, or false

member.name: M:Stimulsoft.Report.Mobile.JSON.Decode(System.String,System.Boolean@)
member.summary: Parses the string json into a value; and fills 'success' with the successfullness of the parse.
member.param: A JSON string.
Successful parse?
member.returns: An ArrayList, a Hashtable, a double, a string, null, true, or false

member.name: M:Stimulsoft.Report.Mobile.JSON.Encode(System.Object)
member.summary: Converts a Hashtable / ArrayList object into a JSON string
member.param: A Hashtable / ArrayList
member.returns: A JSON encoded string, or null if object 'json' is not serializable

member.name: M:Stimulsoft.Report.Mobile.StiParametersClass.ToHashtable(System.Xml.XmlNode,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Convert XML object to Hashtable

member.summary: Filling the list of variables initialized from the database columns

member.name: P:Stimulsoft.Report.Mobile.StiMobileViewer.ExcelUseOnePageHeaderAndFooter
member.summary: Gets or sets a value which indicates that only one page header and page footer will be exported to the result Excel file. The property has affect on Excel 2007-2010 export.

member.name: P:Stimulsoft.Report.Mobile.StiMobileViewer.ExcelPageBreaks
member.summary: Gets or sets a value which indicates that page breaks will be exported to the Excel file. The property has affect on Excel 2007-2010 export.

member.name: P:Stimulsoft.Report.Mobile.StiMobileViewer.ExportDataOnly
member.summary: Gets or sets a value which indicates that only data will be exported into file. The property has affect on Excel and Excel 2007-2010 exports.

member.name: P:Stimulsoft.Report.Mobile.StiMobileViewer.ImageQuality
member.summary: Gets or sets an image quality value which is used in the export of the reports from the mobile viewer. The default value is 1. The greater the value the better quality is.

member.name: P:Stimulsoft.Report.Mobile.StiMobileViewer.ImageResolution
member.summary: Gets or sets an image resolution value in percent which is used in the export of the reports from the mobile viewer. The default value is 100. The greater the value the better quality is.

member.name: P:Stimulsoft.Report.Mobile.StiMobileViewer.ExportResponse
member.summary: Internal use only.

member.name: E:Stimulsoft.Report.Mobile.StiMobileViewer.ReportConnect
member.summary: [8:26:01] stimulsoft: Occurs before creation of the web form in the report. This event is used to connect the report to the specified data.

member.name: E:Stimulsoft.Report.Mobile.StiMobileViewer.ReportDisconnect
member.summary: Occurs after running of the web form. This event is used for disconnecting data from report.

member.name: E:Stimulsoft.Report.Mobile.StiMobileViewer.ReportDialogResult
member.summary: Occurs when a user clicks a button with the specified dialog result on the web form.

member.name: E:Stimulsoft.Report.Mobile.StiMobileViewer.ReportAfterDialogResult
member.summary: Occurs when a user clicks the button with the specified dialog result on the web form, but after invoking the ReportConnect event.

member.name: E:Stimulsoft.Report.Mobile.StiMobileViewer.GetReportData
member.summary: Occurs for getting data for the report.

member.name: E:Stimulsoft.Report.Mobile.StiMobileViewer.ReportExport
member.summary: Occurs when a user starts exporting the report from the mobile viewer.

member.name: E:Stimulsoft.Report.Mobile.StiMobileViewer.ReportDesign
member.summary: Occurs when click on the design button.

member.name: E:Stimulsoft.Report.Mobile.StiMobileViewer.CustomCallBack
member.summary: Occurs when executing a custom ajax request.

member.name: M:Stimulsoft.Report.Mobile.StiMobileViewer.InsertSessionId(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Разбивка url на сегменты и формирование нового url, в состав которого входит идентефикатор сессии

member.name: M:Stimulsoft.Report.Mobile.StiReportResponse.ResponseAsPdf(System.Web.UI.Page,Stimulsoft.Report.StiReport,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Exports report to PDF document and saves this document to the webpage response.
member.param: Webpage to save exported report.
Report, which is to be exported.

member.name: M:Stimulsoft.Report.Mobile.StiReportResponse.ResponseAsPdf(System.Web.UI.Page,Stimulsoft.Report.StiReport,Stimulsoft.Report.StiPagesRange,System.Single,System.Single,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Exports report to PDF document and saves this document to the webpage response.
member.param: Webpage to save exported report.
Report, which is to be exported.
Describes pages range for the export.
A float value that sets the quality of exporting images. Default value is 1.
A float value that sets the resolution of exporting images. Default value is 100.
If embeddedFont is true then, when exporting, fonts of the report will be included in the resulting document.
If standardPdfFont is true then, when exporting, non-standard fonts of the report will be replaced by the standard fonts in resulting document.

member.name: M:Stimulsoft.Report.Mobile.StiReportResponse.ResponseAsPdf(System.Web.UI.Page,Stimulsoft.Report.StiReport,Stimulsoft.Report.StiPagesRange,System.Single,System.Single,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Exports report to PDF document and saves this document to the webpage response.
member.param: Webpage to save exported report.
Report, which is to be exported.
Describes pages range for the export.
A float value that sets the quality of exporting images. Default value is 1.
A float value that sets the resolution of exporting images. Default value is 100.
If embeddedFont is true then, when exporting, fonts of the report will be included in the resulting document.
If standardPdfFont is true then, when exporting, non-standard fonts of the report will be replaced by the standard fonts in resulting document.
If openDialog is true then the Open Dialog Box will be displayed. If openDialog is false then the result of the export will be displayed in the browser window.

member.name: M:Stimulsoft.Report.Mobile.StiReportResponse.ResponseAsPdf(System.Web.UI.Page,Stimulsoft.Report.StiReport,Stimulsoft.Report.StiPagesRange,System.Single,System.Single,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.String,System.String,Stimulsoft.Report.Export.StiUserAccessPrivileges)
member.summary: Exports report to PDF document and saves this document to the webpage response.
member.param: Webpage to save exported report.
Report, which is to be exported.
Describes pages range for the export.
A float value that sets the quality of exporting images. Default value is 1.
A float value that sets the resolution of exporting images. Default value is 100.
If embeddedFonts is true then, when exporting, fonts of the report will be included in the resulting document.
If standardPdfFont is true then, when exporting, non-standard fonts of the report will be replaced by the standard fonts in resulting document.
If openDialog is true then the Open Dialog Box will be displayed. If openDialog is false then the result of the export will be displayed in the browser window.
The user password that manage the exported document access.
The owner password that manage ability to modify exported document.
Defines user access privileges to the document exported.

member.summary: Exports report to PDF document and saves this document to the webpage response.
member.param: Webpage to save exported report.
Report, which is to be exported.
Describes pages range for the export.
A float value that sets the quality of exporting images. Default value is 1.
A float value that sets the resolution of exporting images. Default value is 100.
If embeddedFonts is true then, when exporting, fonts of the report will be included in the resulting document.
If standardPdfFont is true then, when exporting, non-standard fonts of the report will be replaced by the standard fonts in resulting document.
If openDialog is true then the Open Dialog Box will be displayed. If openDialog is false then the result of the export will be displayed in the browser window.
The user password that manage the exported document access.
The owner password that manage ability to modify exported document.
Defines user access privileges to the document exported.
Defines the encryption key length to protect the document access after export.

member.summary: Exports report to PDF document and saves this document to the webpage response.
member.param: Webpage to save exported report.
Report, which is to be exported.
Describes pages range for the export.
A float value that sets the quality of exporting images. Default value is 1.
A float value that sets the resolution of exporting images. Default value is 100.
If embeddedFonts is true then, when exporting, fonts of the report will be included in the resulting document.
If standardPdfFont is true then, when exporting, non-standard fonts of the report will be replaced by the standard fonts in resulting document.
If openDialog is true then the Open Dialog Box will be displayed. If openDialog is false then the result of the export will be displayed in the browser window.
The user password that manage the exported document access.
The owner password that manage ability to modify exported document.
Defines user access privileges to the document exported.
Defines the encryption key length to protect the document access after export.
If useUnicode is true then in pdf files unicode is used.
